title: The use of English prepositions in lexical bundles in essays
author: Young Eun Lee
subject: Previous studies on lexical bundles
content: The purpose of this study is to explore how Korean university undergraduate students useEnglish prepositions embedded in frequently occurring multiword sequences, orlexicalbundles, in their essays. Most prior research on prepositions has centered on prepositionalphrases (PPs), including idiomatic expressions, identified on the basis of their structureand function. This study investigates prepositions in lexical bundles, which are identifiedsolely on the basis of frequency in context and are therefore generally incomplete instructure.
